description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A game we just can't stop playing!  Use your logical thinking and quick reactions to help Frosty the Snowman find all his lost presents.  See if you can beat your fastest time and complete the puzzles in the least number of moves.
